col1_html.content:
A Broadway Hotel Worthy of the Title

We are proudly located in Midtown Manhattan West, on West 47th Street between 6th and 7th Avenues. Pretty much everything that makes New York the place to be can be found within walking distance of our doors. You’ll be in the Theater District, making it easy to catch a show on Broadway. Perhaps you’d like to see the city from atop the Empire State Building. Or maybe you’re the type who needs to see the real-life Hell’s Kitchen and experience the flavors of the world. Whatever your fancy, it’s all nearby.

Looking for Things to Do in Manhattan?

Offbeat museums? Hidden boutiques? Cheesecake? Nature walks? Yes! We’re fans of letting curiosity lead where it might—and we can confirm that New Yorkers really do walk several miles a day, in all kinds of weather. Plus, the OYO is located near subway stops for nearly the whole of Manhattan and the boroughs, so you can easily get further afield.

Times Square Restaurants

You’ll have every imaginable choice, and we are always happy to help with recommendations. Here we venture a few options:

  • The Lambs Club
  • Don Antonio
  • City Kitchen
  • Le Bernardin

NYC Attractions

Start walking in any direction, and you’ll soon reach any number of renowned spots, though you’ll likely stop along the way to explore street-level finds.

  • Times Square
  • Theater District
  • Rockefeller Center
  • New York Public Library
  • Bryant Park
  • The Museum of Modern Art
